name: Lab 4.08
description:
Lab 4.08 Is a 3d puzzle platformer where the player seeks to escape from a lab they are trapped inside. 

Using science knowledge the character has developed, the player can change the size and gravity of objects in order to finish the puzzles and escape the rooms. 

Players can stand in the charge zones around the map to gain energy to use the size changing gun on objects. 

Will you be able to escape from Lab 4.08? 

Created by Lone Polygon a team of aspiring game designers: 

● Stefan (Programmer)

 ● Jacob (Programmer) 

● Joshua (Map/Level Design) 

● Ashe (Level Art) 

● Emilia (UI Art)

 ● Devon (Level Art
